document.full_text: israel has brought forward plans to deploy an "iron dome" rocket interceptor system because of increased mortar and rocket fire from the hamas islamist ruled gaza strip, the israeli military said friday.
document.title: israel to deploy rocket shield system near gaza
lines_and_colors: israel has brought forward plans to deploy an "iron dome" rocket interceptor system because of increased mortar and rocket fire from the hamas islamist ruled gaza strip, the israeli military said friday.
